vulnerability.name: USN-4058-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4058-1 fixed a vulnerability in bash. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that Bash incorrectly handled the restricted shell. An  attacker could possibly use this issue to escape restrictions and execute  any command.

statements.status_notes: A system hardening measure could be bypassed. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
